tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have visited Magnum Dental Care for my father's dental implant consultation after an extensive research. Dr Priyanka with her fellow consultant has clearly explained us about the available options for less bone density and what will be a better fit for us.She was very patient, discussed everything in detail and helped us understand our options.Post discussion with her we were assured that my father is in good hands.

Doctors there  were very compassionate and helped us throughout the process.Dr Priyanka  kept us updated regularly during the procedures and was very patient-centric.

The staff has been friendly and regularly followed up on how my father is doing post the procedures.Dr.Priyanka took additional steps to make sure that there will be no issues with the implants considering the low bone density in my father's case.My father is quite happy and satisfied with the treatment provided. Thanks to  Magnum Dental team for taking great care of him.Overall, our experience has been quite great with them  and would highly recommend this place for any dental issue .

tags: None
review:
Dr. Priyanka was wonderful. *** *** ************** friendly and straightforward. I felt safe in her hands. She helped me figure out what my teeth needed and the steps to take for their health. 
I appreciated how well she listened to my concerns and then explained everything step by step. I've been to 4 dentists in the last 5 years and she has been hands down the best person in this field. 
I highly recommend her to anyone with any dental concerns.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I would like to share my experience about " Magnum Dental Care " 
First of all Magnum dental care is the best dental clinic in  Andheri west.
 Welcoming and friendly :):)
The dentist here is kind and caring, competent, she took time to understand my problem and answered all my queries  along with giving the best result. Clinic is neat and clean. The staff and other specialists are brilliant at their work, they care about the finest details. I would definitely recommend everyone to visit Dr Priyanka Basu if they  are looking for a good Dentist in Mumbai.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I would highly recommend Dr Priyanka Basu because she is the only dentist I feel comfortable with due to friendly and compassionate manner.
I live in England and after visiting many dentists over here and being ill advised on treatments and feeling rushed through appointments I was very grateful during a visit to Delhi I stumbled across Dr Khandari's clinic and met with Dr Basu. Since that day I only visit Dr Basu for my dental treatment and I travel from England to India as I refuse to be treated by any other dentist.

Dr Basu is patient, **** ************** extremely passionate about her work but most of all she has always made me feel at ease. Thank you Dr Basu and keep up the good work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Ceramic Dental Braces,Dental Examinations, fixed retainers,
review: Dr. Priyanka was initially quite friendly when she wanted me to get more *********** treatments. Ever since my braces have come off and there is no reason  to pay, her attitude has changed. The last two times I visited her, she behaved very rudely with me. *** **** ** *******. I had to revisit to get the glue of braces removed that she left on several of my front teeth even after polishing them. She had the audacity to ask me to re-pay for polishing **** ****** ** *** *** ******* **** *** ****** ** * **** *** ** *** ***** ****** **** * ********* *** *********** ******* ******** **** * ******* **** *** ****** *** **** **** ******* I am definitely going to find another orthodontist and would not recommend her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Got my wisdom tooth extraction here 
The procedure was slightly complicated, but it went  well .Dr. Priyanka and her fellow specialist  were  patient with me and  they spend a lot of time explaining me the entire problem and diagnosis, and answerered  all my questions. She was also quite easy to reach on her phone, and was quite caring in continuously checking my well being even after the procedure. I had a great experience overall.Highly recommended doctor.
The ambience of the clinic was not at all like a regular clinic with white lights where one only gets scared

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have no words to praise Dr Priyanka Basu and her clinical and professional skills, she is master of her work . My mother got  her full mouth dental implants and my sister did her invisible braces treatment here. The treatment was thorough, smooth and painless. It took six months for my mothers dental implant treatment and not even once we were disappointed. Always, attended well in time and very good treatment follow up. Thoroughly recommended to anyone in search of best dentist in western suburbs  ....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had to book an urgent appointment regarding this age-old dental crown I have which started to give me some issues all of a sudden and that's when I happened to book an appointment with Magnum Dental Care (Dr. Priyanka Basu) for the same. 

Honestly, my experience was nothing short of what they call perfection. Nearly zero wait time. Issue diagnosed quickly. And before I could think, the problem seemed sorted. To top it all, the advice I got to prevent similar problems to reoccur in future was also helpful.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Almost two half years I was on treatment under Dr. Priyanka. It was absolutely a very pleasant journey I made all through. Her friendly, smiling and ever caring nature is praise worthy üòäAt the end of my treatment I am really happy and satisfied of the out come. Thank you so much Dr. Priyanka üôè & God bless you always

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Priyanka is very gentle to her patients .I used to dread going to dentists but after visiting magnum dental i feel completely the opposite .
recently i had a very bad tooth ache and needed an urgent appointment ,Dr Priyanka accomodated me though she was fully packed with other patients 
will always be greatful to her as she solved my problem and guided me in the best manner 
infact her charges were reasonable in comparison to other dentists around in this area

review: As always, Dr. Priyanka is available to help anyone in need, even during these covid times. The clinic is fully compliant with the covid safety guidelines. I‚Äôve received excellent services for my overall dental hygiene and couldn‚Äôt be happier with my smile thanks to her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Magnum Dental Care is my favorite dental clinic I've been to. Everyone is friendly and does a great job. They take the time to handle everything you need to get done thoroughly. Great communication throughout the entire process from booking to treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My first time there for a cleaning and I was very happy leaving the clinic. The clinic is clean and the team is friendly and welcoming. Dr. Priyanka did my cleaning and she is thorough, gentle, professional and an expert. If you're looking for a dentist - this is the place!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: 5 stars all the way. First time patient here and I am so glad to have discovered this place. I had a deep cleaning, a filling and inquired about Misaligned teeth. Dr. Priyanka Basu was gentle and made sure I wasn't in any pain. The deep cleaning was easy and so was the filling. They really do put a lot of thought into making you feel comfortable. As someone that absolutely hates going to the dentist, I can say that this is hands down the most pleasant dentist experience I've ever had.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: If you‚Äôre nervous about visiting a dentist, Dr Priyanka Basu is the person you need to see. She‚Äôs extremely talented but more importantly, makes you feel at ease at her clinic. Would highly recommend to anyone who‚Äôs searching for a new dentist in Andheri West, Mumbai.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was great! Dr. Priyanka Basu explained the diagnosis well and the procedure went smoothly. The clinic was immaculately cleaned and felt very very safe. I walked away from the procedure better informed and with a better idea of how to prevent such a situation in the future. Highly recommended! *** ** *** **** ************* ** *****

context: Implant Retained Dentures,Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Crowns,
review: The clinic is just like walking into another room of my home. The warmth, the knowledge, the treatment is just superb. Would recommend everyone to visit if they have any sort of a dental issue. Dr. Priyanka Basu is not just a doctor but a friend now. Highly recommended!

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Basu is an experienced 2nd Generation Dentist who runs her state of the art clinic in Andheri west  with the most updated technology and services like 3D scanning , Invisalign , implant services , dental veneers etc. Anyone looking for a good dentist to get rid of your pain or you want a brighter smile or you want a better bite so that you can enjoy what you eat then  you know where to go.The clinic also has other experienced specialists to provide treatment for specific dental problems. Thank you Dr Priyanka Basu for helping me with my dental fluorosis issue.
The clinic is very well maintained  and the instruments were all sterilised. Its amazing how my uncle used to have Dr Sameer Basu as his dentist and how her niece is treating my generation .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
